# API Reference

This section provides a detailed reference for `PicTex`'s public API.

::: pictex.Canvas

::: pictex.Image

::: pictex.VectorImage

## Model Classes & Enums

These are the data classes and enumerations used for configuration.

#### ::: pictex.LinearGradient
    options:
      filters:
        - "!apply_to_paint"
#### ::: pictex.SolidColor
    options:
      filters:
        - "!apply_to_paint"
        - "!_from_hex"
